meta.reasoning: AUDIT LOGGING ASSESSMENT: For single-owner Facet app. Research shows audit logs valuable for multi-user apps but questionable for single-owner. Key question: Who benefits? Owner is admin = only user. Use cases: 1) Troubleshooting own mistakes (could just check git history), 2) Security intrusion detection (but owner would notice), 3) Compliance (not applicable for personal profile). Schema already exists but implementation = 4-6 hours with maintenance burden. Unclear if juice worth squeeze for single-owner use case.
